metadata.title: CVE-2024-26986 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdkfd: Fix memory leak in create_process failure Fix memory leak dueto a leaked mmget reference on an error handling code path that istriggered when attempting to create KFD processes while a GPU reset is inprogress.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
